name: Jukebox
description: A simple song manager for Geometry Dash

issues.info: For any issues regarding this mod, send me a message on my discord: 'fleeym', or open an issue on the project's GitHub. If you can, please give the level or song ID that you are having problems with.

indexes.name: Indexes
indexes.description: An index is a JSON file that tells Jukebox where to fetch song data from. The default indexes that are provided fetch data from Song File Hub. The system is extensible, so you can add your own indexes!

download-timeout.name: Download timeout (s)
download-timeout.description: How many seconds to wait when downloading a song until the download cancels

old-label-display.name: Old popup flow
old-label-display.description: Enables the old way to open the nong popup, by clicking on the song label

fix-empty-size.name: Fix 0.0B
fix-empty-size.description: Fixes levels with multiple songs (and sfx) showing 0.0B size.

experimental-title.name: Experimental
experimental-title.description: Settings that may improve your life, or crash your game. Have fun! :)

autocomplete-metadata.name: Autocomplete metadata
autocomplete-metadata.description: Try to autocomplete song info from metadata when adding. Causes a tiny bit of lag after picking a song file. Doesn't play nice with UTF-8, at the moment
